attributes.action: Footballers getting paid more than Lifesavers is bad
attributes.additional_details: I , and many others across the UK, want Footballers to pay the tax of half their monthly salary, as people who save lives like Doctors and Fire fighters, get paid a lot less than Footballers, who get paid hundreds more for  only entertaining people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA, Premier League and Football League.
